_gram:
({#dadAti, datte; dadO-dade#}, 
{#adAt-adita, dAsyati-te, dAtuM, datta#}; but with {#A#} the
{%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} is {#Atta#}; with {#upa, upAtta#}; with 

{#ni, nidatta#} or {#nItta#}, and with {#pra, pradatta#} or
{#pratta#})
_meanings:
{@--5@} To give
up, sacrifice, surrender; {#prARAm dA#} to
sacrifice one's life; so {#AtmAnaM dA#} to
sacrifice oneself.

{@--6@} To put, place,
apply, plant; {#karRe karaM dadAti#} &c.
